I'd highly recommend "The Dangerous Lives of Altar Boys" for you! This coming-of-age film follows a group of Catholic school friends who plan an ambitious prank, offering humor and relatability. Jodie Foster also directed it, adding to its appeal.

If you're looking for another captivating option, "Better Luck Tomorrow" is a thought-provoking movie about a group of over-achieving high school seniors who explore the darker side of life through criminal activities. It's definitely worth checking out!
